name: Kaiser
description:
![null]() In the world of Kronos. A powerful empire emerged from the ashes of the ancient inquisition. A young boy, crossed the old existent order, like a spear piercing the sea and by his hand the Kaiser's empire was born. The young hero now an old adult. Live every day with the constant attacks of rebel groups that want to dethrone him. But the Kaiser has allies in the flesh as well as in the metal. His life was prolonged more than any opponent leader who wanted to face the regime. His people love him, his soldiers follow him and death denies knowing him. The supreme leader, the king of kings, the son of Apollo and Frigga ... The Kaiser. --- Act I: The miners - Hail Kaiser - # Claws, Horns, and Fangs - Iron Foot
- more... --- FEEDBACK [https://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/player-zone/map-feedback/236023-kaiser-feedback]()
author: vastanx
